forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain this afternoon. High 13C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing this afternoon. High around 55F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers overnight. Thunder possible. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Thunder possible. Low 46F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
